comments.body: It would be a cool way to show off your wealth! "Look I have 50 golden pigs in my palace!" Lol

I would show off golden pigs in a youtube video cause to show what you can do in Minecraft if you work for something. A cool video i would make is a how to get and farm gold pigs like me video. Kinda like you can do it too video.

Only people that try hard can get the gold pigs.  Nice a golden pig achievement should be with it and/or an achievement for crafting gold meat and eating it. Or sharing gold meat with someone else as an achievement.  Another idea would be enchanted golden meat that can only be found naturally in Minecraft worlds wether it be a rare fishing item or in a temple or bastin. Just like the enchanted apples where you get an achievement in bedrock for finding and eating.

I love the concept, but isn’t it a little weird that you’re feeding them gold blocks? Maybe normal pigs should have a 10% chance of turning into a golden pig when feeding it golden carrots; that way golden carrots can finally have an actual use! Also, they should also have a 1.5% chance of spawning naturally.
Do they also drop slime balls upon death? Also are they based on the Atmospheric Jellyfish?

Bryan Massey, no and no, i do not feel slime balls are a good fit for this mob due to its jelly-like behaviour no other mob in the  nether does that.

As for atmospheric jellyfish, thats the first time i've  heard of that so i guess im one of the lucky 10,000
Before i even saw this post, I created a flying warped forest mob. Most of the stuff is different, but I also had a levitation potion made from it.
Nice idea, al alternate drop could be some sort of membrane that can be crafted into a limited use parachute/glider
This would coincide well with the magma roaches suggestion!
I love this, mining in the Nether really needs something to keep us on our toes.
minecraft needs this now!
It's like how the overworld has silverfish, and the end has ender mites, and the nether will have ruby leeches
that would be cool and like a video by either bronzo or Maxcraft they would respawn when they die because zombies never really die they respawn as another annoying zombie
That does make sense as bees try to avoid water in the newest snapshot
I think that's better than more bears for more specific mobs, but I hope they spawn in savannah !

Honey Badgers have a smell that causes bees to flee their hive as well as thick skin to protect them from bee stings. Because of this, when Honey Badgers go near a bee nest the bees should pop out and either avoid the badger or try to attack it, leaving the player alone. Badgers may be immune to bee stings and/or poison. They may not be tamed but could be lured
They should have little claw pixels similar to the pixels on an axolotols arm
There could be an achievement that says something like "Don't tread on me" or "Honey Badger don't care"
Honey badgers are actually my favorite animal, and I would love to see them in Minecraft. Especially if you could tame one! That would be awesome!
they should only spawn in savanna and their should be a bee variant for savanna, one that does more damage
I saw a badger in the minecraft legends trailer and now I really want it in minecraft!
I want honey badger for another update

mmdmx

Jt

Certainly an interesting concept, but I think they should only be able to fly inside when the player is looking in the chest and it's open. I also think that if a chest has the locked tag they shouldn't be able to fly in. I also think it should show a fly buzzing around in the chest so the player is aware. I also think you should be able to see when the food is infested.
yes that is also a good idea.
They should be called Chieftains
Yeah that name is pretty good.
They should have small vines hanging off of there bones.
If they had some form of ability like poison arrows similar to strays that would be cool.

.As there are no hostile mobs unique to the Jungle this would be a cool addition. Also the jungle has a low amount of spawnable spaces so adding a more deadly varient of the skeleton would balance the different biomes better.

I was thinking something like:

https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/community/posts/21347836805901-Cursed-Skeletons-Minecraft-1-21-Trial-Spawner-Mob-Idea
perhaps if he's in shade could also be enough? (Not under direct sunlight)
I like this idea, but I think it should be exclusively blue ice, making it slightly more difficult as well as giving the block a wider range of uses.
This would also make an interesting way to farm blaze rods.
I think this makes sense as Soul Sand already prevents undead mobs from burning in sunlight
I think this should only apply to blue ice so that it won't melt and to make it a tad bit more pricey. Plus Snow Golems should be able to place snow on them.
Updates to mob, moved to Mobs, Animals, and non-Humanoids.
Yes because my golems sit in corners when 100 husks spawn in my village somehow even when I ring the bell
This could give the bell alternative uses, which i think is good, and solves a possible problem
Yes! this would be great, we could set up Patrol stations against raids, it would be nice if villagers also rung them too when attacked
Nice idea!  Is this inspired by Dune?
Your  idea is great but if Mojang is going to add a sand worm it shouldn’t be that op
Your  idea is great but if Mojang is going to add a sand worm it shouldn’t be that op
I think the idea of a sandworm is a great idea! But if you're talking about those things from Beetlejuice, Minecraft should expect to get sued by Tim Burton.
We need this in game ASAP. Or at least a gamerule command to change that.

We are in 2020 and it's still a pain, I agree that mobs should spawn ONLY when light level equals zero. I literally spam torches, and mobs keep spawning on the only block < 7 light level.

 

I hope some one in the staff will review this

100% agree. Heck, it doesn't even necessarily have to be as low as 0, but it's absolutely ridiculous that I build a cool, relatively large open building and have to place torches all over the place and build random light sources in the middle of the room just so I don't walk into my building and find two creepers and an enderman sitting in my place.

It makes no sense at all, and the light level being at 7 is way too bright for monsters to be spawning.

I feel like this should be the easiest thing in the world to change and makes so much sense.
Yes, this is exactly how I feel. Please Mojang, this would improve the game so much, it's unreal.
This would greatly help with lighting up the new noise caves.

They could change the light level mobs can spawn at from 7- to like 4-. We would still have to light up builds but it could be with things like amethyst or glow lichen. You can have darker builds without any new complex mechanic. It is still technically light level 0 at night. The only thing this could do is benefit us

The whole point of the Creeper is to explode. You would take away their purpose. Also, Creepers are one on Minecraft's many unique mobs. They affect Gameplay by throwing a ring of challenge. If you don't like them, play on Peaceful, or go into cheats and disable Mob Griefing.
I like creepers but I would like them to stop killing my dog
You really must be joking. That’s the hole point of them. Just get good. You know you can kill them  easily with any weapon I have killed them with my fist in a cave ones.
Sorry then turn off the world option mob griefing
Dont remove it , creeper is a simbolic of Minecraft , so just nerf a little of the explosion or make other ability for creeper
#koonton
1 creeper blew up my redstone that I worked to hard on

If one creeps and blows up near my house, everything, the roof walls whatever is made of obsidian related or strong material and the roof of steel from mods, so the creeper can't destroy my home. If one crept into my doors, the inside is also made of mostly blocks from mods, which always have 100% drop rate, so I can rebuild his damage.
Definitely don’t remove them ! Play on peaceful if you hate the challenge they provide. You can also light a big part of your world with torches if you don’t want hostile mobs spawning there.

Having paid actual real money for the game, I 100% feel like I should have the right to remove garbage from my copy that absolutely ruins the experience. Creepers make this game NOT FUN for me. Not even a little bit, not even remotely. If other people like them - great. I'm not advocating for removing them from everyone's game - just mine. In fact I should be able to adjust any setting I feel uncomfortable with in a game I spent my money on. The fact that no such option is available for the biggest video game ever thats 100 years old now is proverbial spit in my face. I can see why no one plays this game anymore

412187615171 

So you're saying the 126,000,000 people that play minecraft are "No One?"

Just turn off mob griefing. Creepers are as annoying as crap on smp servers but they're what incentivizes players to light their areas up.
if you don't like them then just go to peaceful. creepers are the icon of minecraft. no way they will be removed lol.
Just reduce health. (5 on the base game, 50 in Dungeons)
Just make them rare.
Just make them rare

I'm not a big fan of creepers either, but nerfing or removing them would just be silly, seeing as they've become one of the most recognizable characters/creatures in Minecraft other than Steve. 

Though, I do think they should be less common than they currently are, encountering 3 creepers at once isn't my idea of fun, and I've feel like they've become a lot more common than they used to be on older versions of Minecraft.
Creepers detract from the fun of the game, why are WE paying the price for Notch messing up pigs? Bad design, 0/10 pls delet

Honestly, I hate creepers. They aren't scary. They're just irritating. When I peacefully collect tree wood or search for an animal to tame, a creeper would always be there to just kill me out of nowhere. They're not a good mob.
cool idea. add some purpose though. that's what Minecraft is looking for.
You mean from Minecraft story mode?
With red shirts.
If they could drop diamonds that would be cool 'cause diamonds are not renewable.

I don't like the idea of slimes being able to recombine.  It's a neat idea, but I just don't like what I can imagine it doing to the gameplay.  If nothing else, it would no longer be safe to have a mini army of cute mini slimes chasing you around.
Good idea but i think it will be harder to kill slimes quickly
Cool idea, but slimes would be annoying combining, they would be obnoxious to fight, neat concept though.

It wouldn't make sense for them to ba able to become 1 again. When they are split, their cut limbs would become their own new life. Their are several real life animals that do this to reproduce. It would never make sense for them to suddenly revert to just 1 life form again.
Are you talking about the Slime Blocks or a new ability for the Slime mob?
and it could fish for you like an Axlotyl
This is cool, can you tame and breed them with fish maybe? Baby penguins would be cute!
Hills are blocky though, so would they be able to just slide on ice?
Please VOTE for the Harvester golem!
This is such a good idea : )
In love with this idea!!
20 votes already!!!
It should just be called "Hay Golem." All golems are "[name of block they are made of] Golem."
They should harvest plants, replant crops, and they put the items into copper chests for the copper golem to sort.
if the golem is able to rust, what about the blocks
i like it more golems
Too much like a mod, this doesn't fit in the base game.

I like the fact that it is with Technoblade, but it seems really overkill. It feels too much like a mod and does not fit with the base game. Don't get me wrong, I loved Technoblade, but I think something smaller to give support for him would be best. Mojang already added a techno pig to the launcher and I think that may be enough. I especially dont like that it would have other Dream SMP member things like a Dream mask and Philza arrows. For technoblade it makes sense we add something into the game but for the others not so much. If we were to add them I think we might as well add other content creators as well, otherwise it would be unfair. I think it would be a great mod though.
yeah EPIC im a dfrnt prsn btw
No he doesn't need to die again 😓
Vexes and Allays are clearly connected. Not only do they look very similar, their names are exact opposites of each other and they are found around Illagers.
Can u do a baby golem
Yeah a baby golem be cool
pleeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaassssssseeeeeeeeee moooooooooooooooojaaaaaaaaaaaaaaannnnnnnnnng
Great idea! Definitely should be done!

This new type of villager will be rare. Any type of villager can be a dark wolf. They can be identified because of their red glowing eyes. These villagers still behave exactly the same, except that they have glowing red eyes. If it is attacked, it will transform into a wolf to defend itself, the dark wolf. It will transform to its wolf form if it needs to use its healing power. It will be trapped in its wolf form during a full moon, but it will not be hostile.

The dark wolf is a black wolf with red glowing eyes, and it is much larger. It does increased attack damage, has increased health, and it is endlessly effected with regeneration. It is immune to fire, drowning, freezing, poison, ect. It will effect players with regeneration after they defeat a raid.
It will also cure zombie villagers.
bello MA INVECE CHE DI UN MORSO AFI CHE CI SONO UNA CERTA POSSIBILITÀ DI ESSERE LUPO MANNARO.

u get me :> FOR ONCE IN MY LIFE SOMEBODY GETS ME :>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>.........>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
yes. even allow more varients after tameing and breeding
